description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Have a blast fighting off hordes of enemies using classic dual analog stick gameplay.  You must master the use of ripples to survive and drive your score to new heights.  This game features retro style graphics, quick twitch gameplay, customizable enemy appearances, and a killer soundtrack.
